content.body: i want to repeat a point i made at the last plenary: i wouldn't interpret "other web platforms could be polyfilled" as motivation for building `AsyncContext`
content.formatted_body: i want to repeat a point i made at the last plenary: i wouldn't interpret "other web platforms could be polyfilled" as motivation for building AsyncContext

content.body: independently i think there's already a lot of positive signal of developer enthusiasm

> <@shuyuguo:matrix.org> independently i think there's already a lot of positive signal of developer enthusiasm

And the usual dynamic-scope curmudgeons have already been not only appeased, but converted into supporters.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @shuyuguo:matrix.org
independently i think there's already a lot of positive signal of developer enthusiasm
And the usual dynamic-scope curmudgeons have already been not only appeased, but converted into supporters.
